subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: When Kansas and North Carolina meet in the N.C.A.A. tournament semifinals, it will be the first time Roy Williams will coach against the team he guided for 15 years.
snippet: When Kansas and North Carolina meet in the N.C.A.A. tournament semifinals, it will be the first time Roy Williams will coach against the team he guided for 15 years.
